column3: Bradesco in Citigroup venture talks-source SAO PAULO
column4: Jan 9 Brazilian lenders Banco Bradesco and Banco do Brasil are in talks to buy Citigroup's stake in a credit card processing joint venture with Elavon Inc
column5: a source with knowledge of the negotiations said on Saturday.

column2: GM Europe operations still loss-making in 2015 -CEO in magazine BERLIN
column3: Jan 9 The European division of General Motors was still loss-making in 2015
column4: but hopes to return to profit this year
column5: the division's chief executive told a German magazine.

column2: Juniper Networks will drop code tied to National Security Agency SAN FRANCISCO
column3: Jan 8 Juniper Networks Inc said late on Friday it would stop using a piece of security code that analysts believe was developed by the National Security Agency in order to eavesdrop through technology products.
